website_summaries.verdict: These versatile tongue cleaners offer the best of both worlds with integrated brush and scraper heads.
pros: Features a flat head with soft, fine bristles to reach into crevices and gently loosen build up
Bristles are designed to resemble a professional scrub brush
Comes with a built in scraper to remove debris
Pack of four is ideal for families
cons: Needs to be replaced every few months

customer_reviews.title: changed my life! (kinda haha)
customer_reviews.text: best tongue scrubbers I have been able to find yet. Love that it has bristles AND the scraper. Most seem to only have the scrape but without the bristles I dont think my tongue comes out as clean. I have purchased multiple and gave them out in self-care care packages I gave to friends and family for christmas. I have converted so many non-believers over to tongue cleaners!
customer_reviews.author: Luke G

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be that person who used their toothbrush to scrub their tongue. NO LONGER! This product is absolutely AMAZING. The brush allows you to dislodge the yucky buildup on your tongue, and the scraper allows you to collect it and remove it all. It's oddly satisfying to see everything come off. Definitely need this, especially when you're sick and using cough drops to treat that pesky sore throat. This value pack is honestly more than worth it. One for the home, one for travel, and an extra set for when you need to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tran

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Check out my review of the PURELINE TONGUE CLEANER. Both are 5 star because they perform as intended. However, in order to achieve full tongue cleanliness, you need both tools. Imagine your tongue as a rebel terrorist camp. The Pureline Tongue Cleaner is the 500 lb bomb that blows everything away. The Orabrush Tongue Cleaner are the surgical drone strikes that take our the terrorists hiding (in this wild analogy) in the crevasses of your tongue. I use both, and the whole thing takes 60 secs or less. Beautiful combo of products.
customer_reviews.author: Yankees98

customer_reviews.title: I am the type of person who stays super conscious of her breath and believes the tongue contributes ...
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person who stays super conscious of her breath and believes the tongue contributes to it. I have used many tongue brushes before, but this one is my favorite. It is too sad that this is not available as it used to be. I love how gentle it is on your tongue but still efficiently scrapes off the built up germs or whatever you call it. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it does. The bristles are extremely soft and gentle, so it doesn't hurt your tongue at all. Even the scraper part doesn't hurt compared to using a regular toothbrush. It's really easy to clean, just rinse it under some water. I have ridges in my tongue and it does an amazing job at getting in there and cleaning things pretty well. It's not perfect in that area, but it's better than anything else I've come across that can clean inside the ridges.
customer_reviews.author: Crista

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand before and I liked the results. The bristles are a bit stiff the first few uses, but become more flexible as time goes on. The scraper part does a good job of cleaning my tongue and getting all the gunk/smell off. You must be gentle while using the cleaner or you’ll gag and/or hurt your tongue. They are EXPENSIVE individually so I bought the “variety” pack which made each tongue cleaner cheaper. I’m satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melly B

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend enough!!!! It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: The best tongue brush ever! Easy to use and it cleans very well with or without tongue cleaning gel. It’s easy to clean. I use them for no longer than 6 months(I’m one of those who’s very anal about oral care and just afraid to use toothbrushes and tongue brushes for years, it’s a personal problem), but even after 6 months it looks and cleans like it’s new. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: lyubov andreyanova

customer_reviews.title: I've used these forever
customer_reviews.text: I've used these since 2012 when they would advertise on YouTube, this company used to even have their own cream/paste you would put on the tongue brush I would use. Ever since I had braces I've never been able to get rid of my white tongue until I started using these - even after brushing my teeth I sometimes notice my breath not smelling as fresh and then I use this and bam - fresh breath!
customer_reviews.author: Noah B.

customer_reviews.title: Scrap a day keeps nasty breath away
customer_reviews.text: Been scraping for many years and this design is by far the best I have used. Little scrub with the brush and then a quick drag with the scrapper piece and see all the nasty crud your tongue collects...nasty! Any who, it’s a great start the my morning and I swap them out every 30 days so this is a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: Mostly for kids in training
customer_reviews.text: My kids liked these, I tried it on my 2 year old but she still doesn’t like it . I think a smaller more narrow size for her would help. Their not easy to clean, & the toothpaste sometimes gets stuck and we have to use our toothbrushes to clean it. The bristles are good but they bend sometimes, making this product a bit ineffective . Do you see the bristles bend?? But like I mentioned, it’s a good training tool for kids
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, definitely helps with breath issues!
customer_reviews.text: These scrapers are just what I needed. I suffer from post nasal drip which can leave my breath a little on the tart side. With these I can swipe my tongue a few times and fell more confident. They're not too hard and my husband and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Cobia

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this product, however, they were not all they were hyped up to be. I have seen no difference from just brushing my tongue with my toothbrush. Frankly, I find the toothbrush does a better job. The mouth piece on the Orabrush is very wide which makes it difficult to brush the back of your tongue. I would not purchase again. Stick to using your toothbrush!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a long time a free plastic tongue cleaner with serrated teeth that you bend into a "U" shape. I wanted something that would do a better cleaning of center tongue groove. Based on reviews I picked this one. After several weeks using it per directions I went back to prior scraper. I found the bristles to be too soft, the head to be too large to get the back of the tongue without gagging, the scraper too small and would benefit from serrations. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: My go-to tongue cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Orabrush since 2009 and it has always worked pretty well for me. I like the minty tongue foam they used to have but they don't seem to sell it anymore. The tongue gel they have now is okay but its messy compared to the foam. The price per orabrush is pretty great now too, i remember buying each one for $7.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using just a tongue scraper for years never satisfied because I still had white tongue. This brush was what was missing!! So excited about this brush! You need the use the bristles on this then you can use the incorporated scraper or another scraper. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Totally Life Changing!!
customer_reviews.text: When the OraBrush first came out years ago I immediately hoped on the bandwagon and tried it out. I liked it, but wasn’t sure if it was actually helping with freshening my breath. I stopped using the brushes about a year ago due to budget cuts and also to see if it actually made a difference. And boy did it ever!! I tried a bunch of cheaper, knock-off tongue scrapers that did absolutely nothing to help with my breath. I repurchased these brushes and I will never live without them again. If you’re debating purchasing this product because you’ve heard it’s gimmicky; don’t. Just get it. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: These tongue cleaners are great
customer_reviews.text: These tongue cleaners are great. They get all the gunk off without making you gag, and they're super easy to clean and use over and over. I've tried a variety of tongue cleaners, and these are by far my favorite. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Actually work
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these free about a year ago and put it in my husband's stocking for Christmas. About as soon as he began using it I never noticed his bad breath again. So we were sold on it and bought this 4 pack so we would never be without. My son took one too. THey are easy to use and really work. The Bad Breath is Gone!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Hygiene product-dental
customer_reviews.text: Tongue scraper are great for getting rid of bad breath. Great for scraping tongue and back of throat to get the dirt out. I love this product. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sony

customer_reviews.title: Great for fresh breath
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great quality. Nice to have a 4 pack with different colors for each family member. These also fit great in a toothbrush holder. Using it takes a bit of getting used to but once you get the hang of it you’ll want to use it every time you brush
customer_reviews.author: KBT

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My tongue was horrible. I started to use this product every morning and my tongue looks so much better now. I was also able to get rid of my bad breath, by using this product once a day, brushing and rinsing with mouthwash twice a day, and flossing once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Clean tongue for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I always used to use my toothbrush to clean my tongue. I know you're not supposed to but I've done it before not realizing they even had things like this available! I love these so much. It's so easy to use and clean and really gets all that grime out from all your tongues nook and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mouth:
customer_reviews.text: These Orabrush Tongue Cleaners in the 4 pak work great. How did I ever live without them, this is a very valuable item for your toothbrush holder, right there on the sink, I keep them out in the open so that my wife will see how much I love oral health. My tongue even thanked me...
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tongue cleaners!! The tongue cleaner on the back of the toothbrush just doesn't do the job. I was so shocked to see how much ickyness was scraped off of my tongue with this! I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: These are great and they get your mouth FRESH. Everybody should be tongue scraping at least 2-3 times a day with flossing, mouthwash, and brushing to keep healthy teeth guns and fresh breath. And these things last forever too. You could change them out in three months, but realistically you could probably use the same one for at least 6 months, extending the value of this already cheap set to TWO YEARS. So these are worth their weight in gold as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: American Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.text: These actually work very well. I had been using a metal tongue scraper but these scrape and also allow for tongue scrubbing. Easy to clean. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AM from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. Much better than the plastic scraper my dentist gave me. It really surprised me because it felt so mild to use compared to a toothbrush or the cheap plastic scraper. But my tongue ended up looking like the before and after pics in the ad, pink and healthy, no more white taste buds.
customer_reviews.author: S. Henke

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's Breath has never been better!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's breath has not been the best so I ordered these for her. After a few days of use it has made a HUGE difference! She was so sensitive about this and now is confident! Worked so quickly! Will always keep a stash of these on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's disgusting to see what comes off of this thing
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Seriously, 5 starts. This thing gets filth I never knew even existed off my tongue. Just be prepared to want to vomit when you see what it pulls out of your mouth. FYI - file the instructions. 1, use the bristles to scratch the tongue. 2, use the scraper to pull the scrapped junk on off your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I will never go without having this
customer_reviews.text: This tongue brush is so much better than using a regular toothbrush to clean the tongue. It is flat with a scraper at the end and has bristles. I am able to clean my tongue way to the back without gagging. It gets my tongue completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Bad breath be-gone!
customer_reviews.text: These tongue brushes are great. I noticed a difference after using them immediately. That slight film on your tongue causes a lot of bad breath, and is very unattractive. These help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these tongue scrapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tongue scrapers and have had the hardest time finding them in the store. I went to 5 different places looking for a replacement for my old one. Needless to say, I was so happy to find this multipack on Amazon! Love that they are manufactured locally in Maryville, TN too! My family will be lifelong supporters after reading that on the label
customer_reviews.author: SmithStine

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I recommend it to anyone that wants to ensure their breath is fresh, unless you don’t have healthy teeth and gums... get that fixed first. This product up’d my mouth game. It takes all the gunk from deep in the back of your tongue and pulls it. It’s eash to clean and addicting. Must have alert!
customer_reviews.author: A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done + better than a cheapo alternative
customer_reviews.text: I felt a little ridiculous getting these at first because you can find one for a buck at the dollar store and I wondered how different they could possibly be...but they're different. These never scratch the heck out of my tongue as the main thing, and I do get the sense the bristly pads work better. Gave one to each of my siblings.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonS

customer_reviews.title: No 5-star product for me.
customer_reviews.text: So many 5 stars, but brushing away all the gunk is cleaner and cheaper. I tried it many times to see the difference for over a month. I barely even use these now, and honestly do not think it cleans better than my rough brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Do you know what it's like to have absolutely no taste in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: I've destroyed several toothbrushes because I cannot stand brushing my teeth without brushing my tongue as well, apparently I'm a little rough with my tongue brushing. I found the Orabrush from watching an ad and I knew I had to have it. This brush has become apart of my morning/night routine and I'm never going back. Do you know what it's like to have absolutely no taste in your mouth? If not then I suggest you buy this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!!! Yes, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I think that everyone should add this to their teeth brushing routine. Helps remove dead skin and debris from your tongue leaving your mouth feeling so much fresher! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JJNICE

customer_reviews.title: coffee/kimchee breath's worst nightmare
customer_reviews.text: my friend recommended this product after I complained about the lingering taste of kimchee/coffee, two of my favorite things, after brushing my teeth. He recommended these and said that he uses it after some probably less savory activities with his boyfriend... lol. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Carrel

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I have to use an inhaler. The powder in the inhaler leaves a film in my mouth. Food does not taste the same. I used the tongue cleaner. My mouth seems to be tasting fresher. I recommend everybody to use these tongue cleaner for better oral hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Paver

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but I don’t notice any difference than using a tooth brush. This is also a little bit more uncomfortable because it has a big plastic part on the end and depending if you accidentally pull hard it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wroe

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeee these little brushes. I Got them for me and my husband I’ve been scraping and tongue brushing for years this gives you both a brush and scrape all in one. My husband has a gag reflex every time when trying to brush his tongue so I got these with him in mind and he says it’s much better they makes it easier for him to brush his tongue 👅 so highly recommend these baby!
customer_reviews.author: QueenH

customer_reviews.title: clean feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how much of a difference this tongue scraper could do until I started using one! Its crazy how much stuff you can scrape off! This pack has the perfect amount, great for sharing in a household.
customer_reviews.author: Niles Getz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Tongue scrappers have been used religiously in my family because we don't like bad breath. I've been using mine for over two years and it still looks in perfect condition, but I figured I should probably change it anyway lol. Very satisfying scrapping the tongue and then scooping everything out with the edge. Love these guys...worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China, like your I Phone. But that said, these are great. I like to spray with Hydrogen Peroxide and put Baking Soda. The nice wide cleaner makes this easy. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Already opened??
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand and the product (from past experiences), but it arrived in an already opened container that was poorly taped shut. Also looks like there was some dirt on a couple of them - probably because it was poorly taped shut
customer_reviews.author: William Moore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Essential Product!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get my husband to use tongue scrapers until I got him this product. I've bought several different brands and this is the best! It's gentle so it doesn't harm your taste buds. Once you've tried this product you'll never feel clean until you use it along with brushing. Absolutely essential product to have. You won't be sorry you bought it!
customer_reviews.author: celesteskycop

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!! 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: These things have been INCREDIBLY helpful in keeping this tongue fresh×clean since high school😜💪🏾 I've been Orabrush-loyal for at LEAST 10 years now, around when they were in the early stages advertising on YouTube. Glad to see them continue to come up over the years, particularly when the product finally hit other stores 🙌🏾 Thanks, Orabrush!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Fast  delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I've always been very self conscious about my breath. This kind of helps I use the little brush part easily but the tongue scraper is kind of hard to use
customer_reviews.author: twinsmom

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Just A Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I did not have many expectations of this product, however, I was very pleased (and disgusted) by how well it works. My mouth feels and tastes a bit weird after using, but that is just a byproduct of scraping a bunch of gunk off of your tongue. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Effective, gentle and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these tongue brushes! Cant go without, I do what is recommend and change my brush every 3 months. The bristles arent harsh and it effectively removes tartar/build-up off your tongue (you can see and taste the difference right away). I simply rinse my brush off with cool water before, while and after using and have never experienced any build-up or odor
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Seriously! Try it! I used to have morning breath bad enough it could kill an elephant. I got these and now, no more bad breath! I have so much more confidence! My tongue is pink instead of coated white. (Nasty, I know. It was embarrassing) I wish I would have had this throughout my whole life! So worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, must have
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my mouth feeling clean, gets rid of bad breath, durable
customer_reviews.author: Danny Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: They work well and seem to make a big difference. I usually use them while my mouth is still full of toothpaste from brushing an then do a few passes with the scraper part.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Tongue brush
customer_reviews.text: I really like the brush. I’ve purchased others. This one was easy to use. Of course if you put the brush to the back of your tongue you may feel like gagging.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia O. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very Gentle and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes it is very gentle and easy to use. I normally put toothpaste on it when I use it. They really get the job done and leave your mouth refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Che mason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many tongue scrapers and these are the best!!! Normally, most tongue cleaners make me gag, but these do not. Great material and I definitely feel the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Bad breath buster!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, they are very nice! My dentist was thrilled when I told him I was using one. Really helped my breath be more fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: ***BEST PURCHASE***
customer_reviews.text: By far the best purchase this year. Im extremely satisfied with the functionality and quality. It is easy to clean and handles like typical toothbrush except for the tongue. The bristles are not too harsh on the tongue but enough to brush off the bacteria off your tongue that appears white (or so). It's oddly satisfying seeing how much gunk i scape out with the tip scraper. Overall, it does exactly what it's suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ryan Deleon

customer_reviews.title: It's become part of my family everyday morning routine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my family noticed I was using one and they wanted to try it out too. It's become a normal part of my Parents' and younger singlings' daily routines now.
customer_reviews.author: Burg

customer_reviews.title: A window wiper for your tongue!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, quality was great! I took this thing and reached deep and gagged a bit lol. This thing does what it does. Cleaned my tongue and i felt fresh. Will it kill off all of your foul breath? no sir it's not a miracle tool. It will help but of course clean eating, brushing 2-3 times a day and mouthwash would probably help that. Wish i could do that clean eating/drinking thing myself.
customer_reviews.author: J Han

customer_reviews.title: It helps you get to the back of the throat
customer_reviews.text: I gave one of these to my wife so she can practice her gag reflex. I can tell you when we go to bed at night it seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Outlaw Will

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! These work well - just as advertised. We use them daily as part of our normal dental care. I was skeptical about the bristles vs. just the tongue scraper. I was pleasantly surprised - the small bristles are soft and fine and work well to clean the tongue. The scraper takes off any excess.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R

customer_reviews.title: It's an easy grab
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond a must for anyone who is terrified of having bad breath. This device will clean your tongue in more ways than you thought it could. And after brushing your tongue. You can actually taste everything better. Every drink/food as a little more pop to its flavor
customer_reviews.author: Caso

customer_reviews.title: Saw this in an infomercial was pleasantly surprised it worked as described
customer_reviews.text: I dont know about everyone else but I hate trying to brush off my tongue with my toothbrush and most of the stuff there does not come off. That in mind I picked up a four pack of these for my wife and I and found that they work wonderfully. I use them as instructed but also find it helps right after using mouthwash and it seems to clean my tongue right off. I do know that sometimes it takes more than one run of the Orabrush but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Leach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dental Routine Add!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to add to dental hygiene routine. I've typically used the scrapers in the past but the brush adds another element that cleans the tongue much more robustly. Definitely helps with bad breath for those who have tried other methods.
customer_reviews.author: An Truong

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Been using this over 3 years now I’ve tried other cleaner. But this is the best cleaner. Doesn’t hurt my tongue like others Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and myself and so far, we both love it! I can totally see the changes on my tongue and even my breath! I had no idea how clean your tongue could get. I love it! It's light, comes in four different color so you don't get it mixed up. It's reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: R.M

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know this was a thing, but now my girlfriend doesn't complain about my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Pace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tongue cleaner, fixes many cases of lingering bad breath instantly. Didn’t realize that this was a 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: this is THE BEST tongue cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist, this is THE BEST tongue cleaner on the market, gentle enough not to cause tissue trauma and very effective! Only one i recommend to patients
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Gardner

customer_reviews.title: A must for everyone-- daily oral care routine!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years. I can't go a day without using this. Much more effective than brushing your tongue with a toothbrush imo.
customer_reviews.author: Elise C.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tongue cleaner, works better than just a toothbrush alone, gets the gunk off my tongue like nothing else. Also use it after drinking coffee to get rid of that coffee breath.
customer_reviews.author: Teasha

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible! First, it has NOTHING to do with the Oral brush company. The bristles are so weak, that they neither clean nor stimulate blood flow on the tongue. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids never to early to teach kids to brush tongue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tongue cleaners
customer_reviews.text: I like these Orabrush tongue cleaners. I used a toothbrush for many years to clean my tongue, and I like these better. They work well, but they are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: PA female

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This really cleans and clear your white tongue looking pink, smelling and looking fresh
customer_reviews.author: Patience Kumi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up using my toothbrush since this does not do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: A.T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! They work great to get the tongue clean and doesn't hurt either. Since using them my mouth seems healthier and cleaner. Helps with bad breathe too.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great design, great use, but I question the value... Usefulness / $.
customer_reviews.author: Southern California resident

customer_reviews.title: These are a must have
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Don’t know how I ever survived without them
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Really removes the "white gunk" from your tongue
customer_reviews.text: I hate smiling or sticking my tongue out because it always seems to be covered with this 'white film' on it. Not very attractive at all! These things, simple as they are, really work to remove that! I now have a nice red/pink tongue that I'm proud to stick out. And actually i've used them in the morning right as I wake up and it helps get rid of the morning breath too.
customer_reviews.author: AJ PV.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I use these all the time. And for 1 bought in-store can get expensive, so when I saw these pack I just had to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O.

customer_reviews.title: Its a tongue brush
customer_reviews.text: Works great ... scraps tongue well and painlessly. I trust OralB products, they've always been my go to for oral hygiene
customer_reviews.author: tuti712

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TONGUE CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: these were used for about 2 months before we stopped using them, I think it was because of our bathroom space limitation and not having a visual on these. However they do work in keeping your tongue clean.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Clean Tongue = Fresh Breath
customer_reviews.text: I've yet to find another product that cleans my tongue so well. Before purchasing this product I usual attempted to brush my tongue with my toothbrush. The first time I used this I was appalled by all the food particles that came out of my mouth. I would recommend this product to both friends and enemies, because let's face it. When someone has bad breath, everyone loses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best. Refuse to buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. Refuse to buy anything else. They're a bit pricey, but they last quite a while. Highly recommended! Won't go without them now.
customer_reviews.author: essa

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased these before and loved them, but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought several Orabrush Tongue Cleaners in the past and loved them. This last 4 pack I bought had extremely stiff bristles. It seems like the very tips of them had maybe melted, or worn down somehow. I still use it, but have to brush VERY carefully in order for my tongue to not end up bloody. Perhaps I received a bad batch? Either way, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dax Fossum

customer_reviews.title: Great tongue brush, be gentle and it will make you tongue sexy.
customer_reviews.text: Some other reviewers point to the stiffness of the brushes, but this has not been the case for me. The brushes are soft, I am gentle on my tongue when I use them (I mean, not _super_ gentle, just normal-I-like-myself gentle) and they work to get the gunk out of my mouth. Seriously, what am I eating that it just plants itself on my tongue? Maybe that's too much info for you, but we can still bond over the interwebs in the fact that you will be tongue gunk-free like me when your brushes arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Salsaontheside

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I used a metal scraper before I discovered this brush. The brush works much better and is safer since it is not metal and will not cut your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: The best to keep your tongue clean
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stuff to clean your tongue. I dont think mine has been that clean since I was born.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Serves their purpose and hold up great. Only reason I have it a 4 star ...
customer_reviews.text: Serves their purpose and hold up great. Only reason I have it a 4 star is because they are a little large and can be uncomfortable when reaching far back on the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZing

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend it since it is priced low and does a good job of cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Removed a lot of gunk from my tongue but tongue is still kind of white. I love the clean feeling but the bad smell does not go away.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: A much better tongue brush
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another tongue brush in the past and spotted these originally in the drug store. A much better tongue brush.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Look at your tongue
customer_reviews.text: Someone told me this and I saw it was white. That is bacteria and that is bad breath. I've been using various brushes for years now but this one is the easiest to use since the bristles are not so rigid like my earlier brush. You'll be surprised how much your breath improves after you see all the muck you take off your tongue. And besides, it's just good hygiene regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Oh

customer_reviews.title: The best ever for getting rid of bad breath!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m literally OBSESSED with these!!! My mouth feels so much cleaner after using it daily. They also help after you eat something strong like garlic or onions to get rid of the bad breath. I’ve also noticed that drinking water or eating food actually tastes better after getting all that junk off of your tongue. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jilian Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: These are a knock off of the actual orabrush brand. I have both and this one is very hard and not soft bristles, it hurts my mouth and I can’t even use it to scrape my tongue because it’s basically just a hard piece of plastic. Shouldn’t have wasted my money on these and just went to Walmart and bought the real ones
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Dunleavy

customer_reviews.title: And all toothbrushes don't have these why??
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 days in, and I've already experienced a difference in the morning. It's not like this is a magical cure or that scraping harder will do better, but I've noticed a change with frequency of use. This thing needs to get strapped to my toothbrush!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scrape your tongue and never hear a complaint of bad breath again! Seriously, they work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Waco

customer_reviews.title: Not the one.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy again. I have used others that do a better job at cleaning the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Galathynius

customer_reviews.title: Good scrappers
customer_reviews.text: Good tongue scrappers. Entire family uses these. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gatchalian

product_meta.title: Orabrush Tongue Scraper, Tongue Cleaner Helps Fight Bad Breath, 4 Tongue Scrapers
product_meta.description: Size:4 Pack| Style:Multicolored90 percent of bad breath comes from a dirty tongue. Use Orabrush to clean yours. Orabrush is a dual action tongue cleaner featuring ultra soft micro pointed bristles that reach into the deep crevices of your tongue to loosen stinky bacteria. The built in tongue scraper then removes the bacteria helping to leave your breath fresh. Designed after a surgeon's scrub brush, Orabrush's micro pointed bristles are designed specifically for the tongue. Rather than using a toothbrush or a tongue scraper that only clears and cleans the surface, use Orabrush.
feature_bullets: Dual-action tongue cleaner featuring ultra-soft, micro-pointed bristles that loosen bad breath bacteria; built-in tongue scraper that removes the bacteria from the surface of your tongue
Micro-bristles reach deep into the uneven crevices of your tongue to loosen and lift away stinky bacteria
Bristles are designed after a surgeon's scrub brush
Collects and removes the bacteria and residue generated from brushing which helps fight bad breath
#1 tongue cleaner in the US; 4 tongue scrapers - colors may vary

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
